trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There were no other sightings in Worcester on or around August 8th 2012
Summary: I did not see the "orbs" when taking the photo. When I down loaded the photos taken, I noticed the 5 "orbs" in the sky. I zoomed in and used some high resolution software at work. I could not explain the "orbs"
divs: sighting detailsi attend a series of motorcycle meets at various pubs in the worcester\glocestershire area every wednesday during the summer. i take many photographs at these meets, of the bikes and people that attend and also landscape shots. on this occasion i took 222 pics. i download them to the facebook site of the group. i did not notice the "orbs" at the time of taking the photo. nevertheless, i was not looking at the sky, but trying to snap a longer distance shot of the pub where the meet was being held. when i downloaded and posted the pics, i noticed the 3 "orbs" in a triangular formation, with 2 further "orbs" to the left and right of the triangular formation. i take many pictures of all sorts, with many hundreds of the bike meets. the camera i use is a fujifilm s5700 and i have never seen any of my photos with such objects in the sky. i have no information on the movement etc of the "orbs" as i only noticed them afterwards. i zoomed in on them using my own pc and a some powerful design software that can greatly magnify photographs with a colleague at work the next day. there did seem to be a darker object behind each of the "orbs" of light. i was puzzled by the photos and could not find an explanation. i consider that it was not a reflection or anything on the lense of the camera, as i had cleaned this prior to attending the event. as background information. i am fascinated by the ufo phenomenon and i'm firmiliar with the major cases. notwithstanding this, i do not have any preconceptions on what they are.
